name: The Captivating Chateau Near Paris
description:
DESCRIPTION
Since 1508, the Chateau has welcomed and housed guests likes King Louis XIII, Anne d'Autriche, Catherine and Marie de Medici, Count Concini and the infamous Léonora Dori, known as the "Galigaï", Charles de Luynes, Marie de Rohan, the Duke of Bourbon-Penthièvre and Leonardo Da Vinci.
Today, our gates remain open for you to experience this piece of French History as never before - as your own. Located only 20 kilometers south east of Paris, the Chateau offers the completely privatized venue for your most precious moments.
The Château and its exceptional environment within a splendid 54 hectare estate will provide you with an ideal setting for your wedding celebration. Its authentic architecture, its vast bodies of water, its wide alleys and its wild forest will form the dream setting of your reception. He assures you of a happy marriage which will begin with an extraordinary banquet.
The château is embellished by the authentic craftsmanship of the renaissance era. This includes the ceilings, chimneys and parquet floors. A marble staircase of honour was added later, adding to the magnificent charm of the venue. The three main reception rooms can be used together to create a total surface area of 250 m2.
You can host up to 300 guests for a standing cocktail, 250 guests for a seated dinner and up to 300 guests for an interior or exterior ceremony.
The Château, a perfect illustration of the style and cachet of the French Renaissance, will be the ideal setting for your reception. Its inn, a former post house, has a paved courtyard with two 150 m2 platforms. A place of choice for your wedding aperitif. Its buildings will be the perfect setting for your meal. The castle also has old stables, a granite forest house, stables and a dovecote.
We are thrilled to welcome you for weekly and weekend events on this completely privatized domaine of which 2 hectares of delightful greenery will be at your disposition for your ceremony and cocktail. The Château lends itself perfectly to any type of reception and will ensure the success of your wedding celebration. Its exceptional moat setting, its basements with important underground galleries and its old vaulted kitchens, etc., also make it the ideal place for film shoots. It also has production and management premises, as well as a space for dressers and make-up artists.
This exceptional château welcomes you just 20 kilometers from Paris. This impressive building will be the ideal setting for your wedding reception and promises you an unforgettable moment, filled with emotions.
Photo Credit: Diane Photographie
